casebody.data:
Mellony BURLISON, et vir, as Parents and Next Friends of C.M., petitioners,
v.
SPRINGFIELD PUBLIC SCHOOLS, et al. No. 12-1423. Supreme Court of the United States Oct. 7, 2013.

Case below, 708 F.3d 1034.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Eighth Circuit denied.
